Text: jobsMatt To refresh your memory from Friday night I got laid off and am doing independent work right now Although the money is good the stability is a factor So if there is anyone you might know at Enron to help me get an interview for that associate program I would appreciate it My resume is attached Thanks for helping me out Take care DAS PS LSU preseason ranked in CBS Sportsline power poll Not sure how I feel about that Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at DASResumedoc

Re jobsI got a response on the same day you sent it to them I think it is automatically generated Thanks again for passing it on I will be busting my ass to find a job after my vacation and will be much more proactive Its hard to try too hard knowing you will be out of the country for two weeks I will keep you posted I will have access to this shitty email account overseas Talk to you later By the way this is what they sent me Dear Andy Shackouls Your friend Matthew Lenhart recently submitted your name for consideration for employment at Enron We will review your qualifications and will contact you when an appropriate position becomes available If you believe that Matthew Lenhart submitted your application in error please disregard this email In the meantime if you would like more information on working at Enron please click on the following link corpworkatenron Best regards Enron Recruiting Original Message From Sent Thursday June PM To Subject RE jobs have you heard back from enron Original Message From Andy Shackouls ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAndyShackoulsCashackoulshotmailEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday June PM To Lenhart Matthew Subject jobs Matt To refresh your memory from Friday night I got laid off and am doing independent work right now Although the money is good the stability is a factor So if there is anyone you might know at Enron to help me get an interview for that associate program I would appreciate it My resume is attached Thanks for helping me out Take care DAS PS LSU preseason ranked in CBS Sportsline power poll Not sure how I feel about that Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at File DASResumedoc File DASResumedoc
